summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to technology expenditures; increasing the expenditure allowance in the 1999 budget of the Department of Information Technology for the purpose of managing fiber optic projects with other governmental agencies; to increase the expenditure allowance in the 1999 budget of the Department of Information Technology for certain unanticipated expenditures; and allowing the Department of Information Technology to receive reimbursement from the other agencies who are parties to the agreements for the costs attributable to them; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
